game_sheet.synopsis: - Fantasy genre blended with spec-ops methodology (Apocalypse Now meets Middle Earth). - Player Role: 'Architect' (C2 Commander). You are not in the field; you manage the squad via a multi-channel Echo Shard net. - Tone: Laconic, dry humor, businesslike (Fantasy Agent K). - Goal: Terminate the rogue Warlock Malakor.

unit.psych: Cynical, logical, mission-hardened. Needs clear tactical reasoning.
Surly, respects strength. Requires decisive commands. (Full Metal Jacket vibe).
Brilliant but ADHD. Enthusiastic about lore/tech. Needs refocusing.

chapter.title: The Foot of Certain Death Mountain
chapter.main_objectives: - THREAD A (The Rusted Tankard): Secure the Orichalcum dagger from Greeb. (Sam's ideal task). - THREAD B (Herb's Herbs): Acquire the Unicorn Cloak for signal jamming. (Mike's ideal task). - SECURITY: Maintain a protective perimeter to avoid Wraith Strikes. (Dave's ideal task).

chapter.npcs: - Greeb Snelling: [IMG: greeb.jpg] Veteran landlord. Suspicious of outsiders; hates aggressive 'Daves'. - Herb Byfrost: [IMG: herb.jpg] Eccentric alchemist. Needs someone who speaks 'technical' (Mike) to avoid overpaying.
